Body:
request = Request(method, url, headers).with_content(content)
data = b''
async for chunk in scribe.write_request(request):
    data += chunk
assert data == expected_result
pytest.mark.asynciopytest.mark.parametrize('url,method,headers,content,expected_result', [(
    b'https://robertoprevato.github.io', 'GET', [], None,
    b'GET / HTTP/1.1
host: robertoprevato.github.io
content-length: 0

'
    ), (b'https://robertoprevato.github.io', 'HEAD', [], None,
    b'HEAD / HTTP/1.1
host: robertoprevato.github.io
content-length: 0

'
    ), (b'https://robertoprevato.github.io', 'POST', [], None,
    b'POST / HTTP/1.1
host: robertoprevato.github.io
content-length: 0

'
    ), (
    b'https://robertoprevato.github.io/How-I-created-my-own-media-storage-in-Azure/'
    , 'GET', [], None,
    b'GET /How-I-created-my-own-media-storage-in-Azure/ HTTP/1.1
host: robertoprevato.github.io
content-length: 0

'
    ), (b'https://foo.org/a/b/c/?foo=1&ufo=0', 'GET', [], None,
    b'GET /a/b/c/?foo=1&ufo=0 HTTP/1.1
host: foo.org
content-length: 0

'
    )])
